short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up the process of reporting scam posts on Twitter (X).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click a Tweet & press Report and let the extension take care of filling out the rest of the form.
The spammer is auto-blocked along with the report!
